summary: The video follows the journey of Tori and Zach Roloff from their meeting to parenthood, highlighting their experiences, challenges, and advocacy.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a black screen, followed by a graphic of a hand clicking on a 'Subscribed' button with a bell icon, indicating a call to action for viewers to subscribe to a channel. The scene then transitions to a woman with long brown hair, wearing a light-colored sweater, sitting in a room with a yellow wall and a white light switch in the background. She appears to be engaged in a conversation, as suggested by her facial expressions and slight movements. Throughout this segment, a 'Subscribe' button graphic is visible in the top left corner of the screen, reinforcing the call to action. The video then shifts to a close-up of the same woman holding a circular wooden ornament with a painted image of a schoolhouse and the text 'I survived the first day of Kindergarten!' (indicating a humorous or nostalgic reference to her experience). The background changes to a living room setting with a beige couch and a small decorative item on a table, suggesting a more personal and intimate environment. The video maintains a consistent theme of encouraging viewers to subscribe while showcasing the woman in different settings and contexts.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with a short, upbeat electronic music sting, transitioning into a male narrator describing Tori Roloff's journey into motherhood and unexpected challenges. The tone is conversational and informative. He mentions that Roloff gave birth to a child, Jackson, who, like his father, was born with a type of dwarfism. According to the narrator, Tori was well-prepared to be a mother since she had worked as a kindergarten teacher, writing that she would miss her students.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a couple sitting on rocks in a forested area, dressed in black jackets and rain boots, sharing an intimate moment. The woman, wearing sunglasses on her head, gently touches the man's face as they sit close together, surrounded by trees and rocks. The scene transitions to a group of people standing in a barn, dressed casually in jeans and shirts, with hay bales and wooden structures in the background. The next scene shows a group of people posing together against a plain white background, with one person in a pink shirt leaning forward and others in casual attire, including a blue shirt and a gray shirt. Throughout the video, a yellow 'Subscribe' button with a person's image is visible in the top left corner, encouraging viewers to subscribe to the channel. The video captures moments of affection, family, and togetherness, set against different backdrops.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with a single male speaker discussing a reality TV star and her family, contrasting them with the Kardashians, highlighting that the family members have dwarfism, and mentioning the family was offered a reality TV show to "educate people about dwarfism." A female speaker is quoted to say, "Nothing else has depicted dwarfism in an everyday way." The male speaker continues, describing the show as following the family's business and that it helped enlighten the public. A stranger thanked the female speaker, saying that the show had helped him learn about his baby with dwarfism. The female speaker is then quoted to say, "just the experience of having watched our show encouraged them and inspired them." Finally, the male speaker says, "then during the 2010 pumpkin picking season." An upbeat, simple tune with piano plays faintly in the background.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with two individuals sitting on a hay bale, accompanied by a large, black and white dog wearing a bandana. They are dressed in casual attire, with one wearing a black jacket and the other in a black Nike jacket. The scene transitions to a wedding ceremony where a bride in a white dress and a groom in a black suit walk down the aisle, holding hands and smiling, surrounded by guests seated on either side. The next scene shows a pregnant woman in a black swimsuit and a light blue cover-up standing next to a young boy in a striped shirt, with a scenic ocean backdrop. The video concludes with a family portrait featuring a man in a blue shirt, a woman in a white dress, and a newborn baby wrapped in a blanket, sitting together in a cozy indoor setting. Throughout the video, a 'Subscribe' button is visible in the top left corner, encouraging viewers to subscribe to the channel.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with a male narrator discussing Tori's part-time job on the Roloff's farm, mentioning her meeting Zach and their subsequent relationship, which led to an engagement announcement on Instagram and a wedding filmed by TLC. He continues describing the fan's reaction to the news, and their anticipation of the news of a family addition. Further discussion included whether the baby would inherit dwarfism. Tori stated that "no parent wants to hear that their child is different, no matter what that is," while Zach said, "to me, that's not different, he's just like me." As the narration concludes, he mentions the birth of their son Jackson with dwarfism and their encouragement of him, with Zach stating, "you have to encourage a dwarf child a little more because it will take them five steps to do what others can do in two."

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a heartwarming scene of a couple sitting together in a hospital room, holding a newborn baby wrapped in a white blanket with a blue cap. The man is wearing a blue shirt, while the woman is dressed in a white robe. Behind them, a bouquet of flowers adds a touch of color to the room, and a 'Subscribe' button with a yellow background and a cartoon face is visible in the top left corner. The scene transitions to a close-up of the baby lying on a white surface, dressed in a blue and white striped outfit, with numbers 1 to 12 written on the wall around them, indicating a milestone photo session. The baby is positioned under the number 1, and the numbers are arranged in a circular pattern, suggesting a countdown or a sequence of months. The baby's feet are visible, and the outfit has a small label on the front. The video continues to show the baby in the same outfit, now positioned under the number 3, with the numbers 2, 1, 10, 11, and 12 visible around them. The baby's hands are clasped together, and the 'Subscribe' button remains in the top left corner. The video concludes with the baby positioned under the number 4, with the numbers 3, 2, 9, 10, and 11 visible around them, maintaining the same outfit and hand position. The consistent presence of the 'Subscribe' button throughout the video suggests a call to action for viewers to subscribe to the channel.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with a male speaker, adopting a matter-of-fact tone, talking about raising a child with the principle of earning trophies, regardless of being a dwarf. He then shifts to mentioning Zack and Tori sharing Jackson's milestones on Instagram, enjoying every moment. Next, the same male speaker relays how Tori posted about Jackson at one month old, highlighting his eating habits, soccer-watching with his dad, his vocalization, and sleeping patterns, calling it a "brief little rundown of her motherhood."

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a woman holding a newborn baby wrapped in a white blanket with grey polka dots, wearing a grey hat. The woman, with long brown hair, is in a room with a vase of flowers on a wooden dresser in the background. The scene transitions to a black and white shot of the woman sitting on a deck, wearing a striped shirt and holding the baby, who is also in a striped outfit. The woman is seen smiling, with a name tag reading "Wild Soul" visible on her shirt. The video then shifts to a color shot of the woman outdoors, holding the baby in a blue outfit with star patterns. The woman, now with a red hair accessory, is surrounded by greenery, indicating a garden or park setting. Throughout the video, a yellow "Subscribe" button with a cartoon face is visible in the top left corner of the frames.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip starts with a male speaker describing Tori's July 2017 post, highlighting it as longer and more serious, addressing a problematic but undiscussed issue after childbirth. He quotes, "hands down the hardest thing about being a mom has been breastfeeding," and emphasizes Tori's surprise at its difficulty and the feelings of those who cannot breastfeed. He says "I also hate the stigma of breastfeeding." The speaker continues, describing breastfeeding as natural yet accompanied by confusing rules, especially in public, and the judgment faced by women who cannot breastfeed, leading to feelings of shame and inability to bond. All throughout the speech, there is a calm, consistent ambient background music.

events_list.video_caption: The video features a woman holding a baby in various outdoor settings. Initially, she is seen in a garden with lush greenery, wearing a white top and a red hair accessory, smiling warmly at the camera. The scene transitions to a sunny area with a stone wall and trees in the background, where the woman, now in a black top, continues to hold the baby, who is dressed in a striped outfit. Throughout the video, the woman maintains a gentle and affectionate demeanor, cradling the baby securely. A yellow 'Subscribe' button with an image of a woman appears in the top left corner of the frames, encouraging viewers to subscribe to the channel. The video captures a serene and loving moment between the woman and the baby, set against the backdrop of a peaceful outdoor environment.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip starts with a male speaker who states that "currently, 49 states in the U.S." allow women to breastfeed in public, except for Idaho, expressing a concerned tone about possible harassment and the actions of snapping pictures, and asking them to "leave the premises." He also says, some faced verbal abuse, and while steps are being taken to prevent this from happening, "it still goes on."

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a blurred image of a person in a forest setting, followed by a clear shot of a baby lying on a textured blanket, dressed in a navy blue outfit with green lettering. The baby's hands are visible, and a 'Subscribe' button with a cartoon face is displayed in the top left corner. The scene transitions to a close-up of the baby's face, maintaining the same outfit and background. The video then shifts to a family in a swimming pool, with a man holding the baby, who is now wearing a diaper, while a woman stands behind them. The 'Subscribe' button remains in the top left corner throughout the video. The family appears to be enjoying a moment together in the pool, with the baby being the focal point of the scene.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip begins with a male speaker discussing actress Amanda Seyfried's remarks on breastfeeding, quoting her: "Breastfeeding is awesome, formula is awesome, feeding your baby is awesome, not awesome, judgement." He notes her reposting of a quote discussing the biological imperative of breastfeeding. The speaker then mentions a question that Tori wants answered.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a family of three, consisting of a man, a woman, and a baby, standing in a swimming pool. The man is shirtless, and the woman is wearing a striped swimsuit. The baby is dressed in a diaper with a pattern. The family is smiling and posing for the camera, with the woman holding the baby and her arm around the man's shoulder. The background shows the edge of the pool and some tiles. The scene then transitions to the same family standing in a field of tall grass and wildflowers. The man is now wearing a white shirt and black tie, while the woman is in a long dress. The baby is dressed in a white shirt and dark pants. The family is again posing for the camera, with the woman holding the baby and her arm around the man's shoulder. The background shows a vast field with a warm, golden light, suggesting it is either sunrise or sunset. The video then shifts to a close-up of a woman holding a baby. The woman is wearing a black t-shirt with the letters "CA" in red and yellow, and the baby is dressed in a light-colored outfit with white socks. The background shows a wooden deck and part of a house with yellow and white trim. The woman is smiling and looking down at the baby, who appears to be looking at her. Throughout the video, there is a yellow "Subscribe" button with an image of a woman in the top left corner of the frames.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with a single female speaker reading a quote about feeling awkward when feeding a baby in public. The speaker emphasizes the sentiment of the post, particularly highlighting pride and gratitude. A second female voice then reads a comment, taking a supportive tone to breastfeeding or not breastfeeding being a personal choice. Another female speaks in a similar vein, stating that breastfeeding is difficult and expressing frustration towards stigma. The narrative continues with the first female speaker emphasizing that virtually every comment was positive and thanking the initial poster. Finally, she references a comment that denounces the “breast is best” theory. Soft, gentle music with a calm and peaceful vibe featuring acoustic instruments is played lightly in the background, supporting the overall tone of thoughtfulness.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a woman holding a baby in her arms, both dressed in black shirts with the text "DADDY 7" in pink letters. The woman is wearing a black shirt with a red "A" on it, and the baby is wearing light gray pants and white socks. They are standing outside in a grassy area with a building in the background. The woman is smiling and looking at the baby, who is resting its head on her shoulder. The scene then transitions to a close-up of the baby lying down, wearing a gray and white striped onesie with a zipper. The baby appears to be resting comfortably on someone's lap, with the person's blue jeans visible in the background. Throughout the video, there is a yellow "Subscribe" button with a cartoon image of a woman's face in the top left corner of the screen.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip begins with a soothing instrumental background music piece. This is shortly followed by a single male voice, reading a message from an individual working in women's services. The speaker quotes part of the message verbatim, highlighting concerns about the emphasis on breastfeeding and its potential impact on postpartum depression. The speaker also notes the work needed to address stigmas around breastfeeding and recent pushback on the issue. The calming instrumental music continues subtly in the background.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a close-up of a baby lying on someone's lap, dressed in a grey and white striped hoodie with a zipper, and resting on blue jeans. The scene transitions to an outdoor setting where a woman with long dark hair is holding the same baby, who is now wearing a blue and white striped outfit. The woman is smiling, and the background features a tent and some foliage, suggesting a casual, possibly festive environment. Throughout the video, a yellow 'Subscribe' button with a cartoon image of a woman appears in the top left corner, encouraging viewers to subscribe to the channel. The video captures a tender moment between the woman and the baby, highlighting their bond in a relaxed and cheerful atmosphere.
events_list.audio_caption: The audio clip starts with a single speaker describing celebrities openly breastfeeding on social media, including specific examples, spoken in a conversational tone. This transitions to a discussion about a baby named Jack Roloff, followed by praise for the baby's smile, still using the same speaking tone. The audio clip ends with an encouraging message of continued growth for the baby, spoken with warmth.

events_list.video_caption: The video begins with a black screen featuring a small yellow sign in the top left corner with the word "Subscriber" written on it. The scene transitions to a white background displaying the text "thanks for watching" in green, accompanied by a play button icon. Below this, a thumbs-up icon appears with the text "drop a like" in green. The video then shifts to a green background with the text "and don't forget to" in white. Following this, a YouTube interface is shown with a hand icon clicking on the "Subscribe" button, which changes to "Subscribed" with a bell icon next to it. The hand icon then clicks on the bell icon, turning it on. The video concludes with a black background featuring a blue thumbs-up icon, a green arrow pointing to a red YouTube play button icon.
events_list.audio_caption: The clip starts with the sound of a harmonica playing in a melancholic style. A male voice then interjects, uttering "I'm in". Subsequently, the harmonica music resumes.
